warlockMod:Corruption.NAME: Corruption
warlockMod:Corruption.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage over 5 turns. warlockmod:Affliction. warlockmod:Curse.

warlockMod:SummonVoidwalker.NAME: Summon Voidwalker
warlockMod:SummonVoidwalker.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Voidwalker warlockmod:Demon, which grants !M! Block each turn. Costs 1 [#EFC851]Soul[] [#EFC851]Shard[]. warlockmod:Demonology.

warlockMod:CurseOfWeakness.NAME: Curse of Weakness
warlockMod:CurseOfWeakness.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weakened, and reduce the target's Strength by up to [#87ceeb]6[], but not below [#87ceeb]0[]. warlockmod:Affliction.

warlockMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
warlockMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

warlockMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
warlockMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
warlockMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

warlockMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
warlockMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

warlockMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
warlockMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !warlockMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

warlockMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
warlockMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !warlockMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
